mdRecord.dcterms:title: Centennial Celebration of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association, October 24, 1953
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Members of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association form a reception line in the new room to welcome guests to their centennial celebration. From left to right: Mrs. Gary; Guest(?); Guest (?); Mrs. Harkness, Regent of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association; Guest (?); Mrs. Isham, Vice Regent for Illinois; Miss Tyler, Vice Regent for District of Columbia; Mrs. Burdick (becomes Vice Regent for Delaware 1961); Mrs. Lamont, Vice Regent for New York; Mrs. Sullivan, Vice Regent for New Hampshire; and Mrs. Christopher Ward.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon Ladies' Association of the Union -- Anniversaries, etc.
